title: Azir's mighty voice - Global voicings
body: Some of Azir's voicings have recently become teamwide for me (e.g.: I'm top, he's mid, on his lane, I'm watching my own lane and i've got a sudden "Trust in my vision" coming out of nowhere -when he drops a ward I guess? Didn't pay much attention-). Not quite gamebreaking, but still strange.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This should have been resolved in Patch 6.9, IIRC. Please lemme know if this is still occurring once you patch up! Thanks for the report. ^-^
Have had the same thing happening to me when i play with allied Azir's not sure if it does it with enemy Azir as well. And i would believe it's the result of placing a ward
